coded_answer.p: I am writing in response to your letter in order to give you some further information about the international student conference inat our college.

I would like to inform you that your group has been booked into the Palace Hotel. It is situated in the centercentre of our town and it takes five minutes to get to the college, where the conference is going to be held. I think that the best choisechoice for you is to take the 234 bus. The bus stop where you should get off is called "The Green Man".

With reference to the end-of-conference party, which is going to take place on Tuesday from 8:00 until midnight, I would like to mention the necessary dress code. It is an evening dress for women and black trousers, a white shirt and a black bow tie for men.

Lastly, I would like to give you some suggestions about wayways in which you can spend your free time in our town. I am strongly convinced, that you should visit the local Science Museum. Also there is a very good shopping centercentre next to the museum.
I look forward to seeing youryou at the conference and hope that you will have a good time in our town.
